cards.text: ask Siri, "Who's her daddy?"
attempt to say the alphabet backwards.
brush your teeth.
call a pizza place and ask if they have tacos.
call a random number and see what happens.
call someone and immediately tell them that you're busy.
comment "play doghouse" under Oprah's last social media post.
describe a "first time" experience.
do 10 burpees.
do 25 jumping jacks.
do a handstand.
do a split.
do the Cha Cha Slide for the group.
drop ice down your shirt.
video call your oldest relative and ask if they're down to do "something crazy."
give a compliment to every player.
give the person on your right a massage.
guess the middle name of every player.
let the group look through your phone for one minute.
let the group pose you in an embarassing position and take a picture.
let the group DM your celebrity crush on one of your social media accounts.
lotion the eldest player's elbows.
message your mom and ask where you can find the day-after pill.
name 7 European countries and their capitals.
open a bottle without a bottle opener.
order a copy of doghouse for your boss.
post a picture of your feet on one of your social media stories.
prank call your favorite cousin.
pretend to be the person to your right for five minutes.
read the last text you got.
re-dial your most recent caller and tell them "the deal is off - I'm making an Onlyfans."
sing your school song.
search "bitch" in your message and read the first text that pops up.
send a "I love you" text to your most recent group message.
send your significant other a text calling them the wrong name.
share an unpopular opinion you have.
share a secret you have kept from your parents with the group.
share with the group the meanest thing you have ever said to someone.
share your best pickup line with the group.
share your most embarassing memory.
share your guilty pleasure song with the group.
show the group the most embarassing photo on your phone.
show the group your camera roll content from last Halloween.
sing the chorus of your heartbreak song.
sit in a squat position for the next round.
share the most recent lie you've told with the group.
tell a short story in your best accent.
tell the group a bedtime story.
tell the group one of your biggest regrets from the past year.
tell the group what your worst habit is.
tell the group who you would want to switch lives with and why.
tell the story of your prom night.
text a family member "wanna fight?".
turn off your phone for the rest of the game.
with your mouth full of water or your drink, say your name.
talk without lcosing your mouth.
text someone using only your nose.
tell the group the last thing you searched for on your phone.
tell the group an embarassing story from your childhood.
bark every time someone swears until your next turn.
peel a banana and eat it using no hands.
tell the group the last thing you thought about while sitting on the toilet.
tell the group the story of your sexual awakening.
share with the group your most recent regrettable purchase.
tell the group what your first impression was of the person sitting to your right.
write your name on the floor with your tongue.
lift up the cushions of the nearest couch. If there is anything under them, you need to put it in your mouth.
have the player to your left give you something to drink. Slam it.
make sock puppets and reenact your first kiss for the group.
